suite.name: Faustx

test.name: User should be able to navigate through all dropdown menus

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.
kw.msg: Opening browser 'chrome' to base url 'about:blank'.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Go To
kw.doc: Navigates the current browser window to the provided ``url``.
kw.msg: Opening url 'https://www.faustx.com/en/'

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Not Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is not visible.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Set Variable
kw.doc: Returns the given values which can then be assigned to a variables.
kw.msg: ${SET_CLICK_VAR} = click about us section

kw.name: Element Text Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` contains exact the text ``expected``.
kw.msg: Verifying element 'xpath=//*[@id="navbarSupportedContent"]/ul/li[2]/a' contains exact text 'About Us'.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.
kw.msg: Clicking element 'xpath=//*[@id="navbarSupportedContent"]/ul/li[2]/a'.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.
kw.msg: Clicking element 'css=#navbarSupportedContent > ul > li.nav-item.dropdown.show > div > a:nth-child(1)'.
